unicycleDynamics module

Author : yyang52 date： 8/24/23

unicycleDynamics.create_unicycle_pose_controller(approach_angle_gain=1, desired_angle_gain=2.7, rotation_error_gain=1)[source]

Returns a controller ($u: mathbf{R}^{3 imes N} imes mathbf{R}^{3 imes N} o mathbf{R}^{2 imes N}$) that will drive a unicycle-modeled agent to a pose (i.e., position & orientation).

Parameters:

  • approach_angle_gain – affects how the unicycle approaches the desired position

  • desired_angle_gain – affects how the unicycle approaches the desired angle

  • rotation_error_gain – affects how quickly the unicycle corrects rotation errors.

Returns:

the pose_uni_clf_controller_custom function

Example

>>> controller = create_unicycle_pose_controller(approach_angle_gain=1, desired_angle_gain=2.7, rotation_error_gain=1)
